title: Drawing, "Sketch of Trude and John for Project "Faces"", ca. 1974
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Tracing of the photograph of Trude and John in profile facing left (1993-121-103), with patches of shadow hatched-in forming abstract shapes.  This sketch represents second stage in the design process toward a finished tapestry.  See also 1993-121-107,109,110.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch of Trude and John for Project "Faces"", ca. 1974.
ca. 1974. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-104.
